name: streetscape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the appearance or the design of the streets in a town or city: The administration had made splendid improvements to Chicago's streetscape. $4 million in state and county funds was obtained to pay for a new streetscape, including brick sidewalks.
a work of art representing a view of the streets in a town or city: The exhibit features a soulful New Orleans streetscape by Dean Mitchell. Our online workshop will give you tips on painting atmospheric streetscapes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe planting of trees and provision of benches is making the streetscape more pedestrian-friendly.The sight of dark-suited men leaning on one another, staggering toward taxis, is part of this city's nighttime streetscape.Right across the city, delis and bodegas are a familiar part of the streetscape.Until recently the red phonebox was a familiar part of the British streetscape.They played Springsteen's warmly melodic streetscape "Girls in Their Summer Clothes".
